alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 12:58AM CDT until May 09 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHERRY AND NORTHERN GRANT COUNTIES... At 1158 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Ashby, or 42 miles north of Arthur, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashby, Whitman, Duluth, Dipping Vat Meadow, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road and Mother Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 133 and 141, and between mile markers 152 and 164. Highway 61 between mile markers 160 and 186. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
